column1: Uchi////I've had absolutely nothing even questionable on the delicious scale here. The amazing brussel sprouts
column2: the light and fresh hama chili
column3: the bold Walu Walu and perhaps the best thing I've ever eaten in my life
column4: the foie gras negiri is too splendiferous to even try to put into words. It's most of a religious experience than anything else.
